subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Craig Dahl’s knee injuries cut short a promising career with the Giants in 2007, but after a trip back to college and then six seasons with two other teams, he finds himself back where he started.
snippet: Craig Dahl’s knee injuries cut short a promising career with the Giants in 2007, but after a trip back to college and then six seasons with two other teams, he finds himself back where he started.
